urls.title: ICA LGBTQ 2021 Online Mentoring Meet-Ups - International Communication Association
urls.description: Dear LGBTQ Studies IG Members, Since 2017, our Interest Group has organized informal mentoring sessions between early career and senior scholars during the ICA annual conference. While we put the program on hold for 2020, it is returning this year in a virtual format! These informal meetings are between senior scholars (mentors) and early career researchers (mentees). You do not have to be a graduate student to participate as a mentee! We will assign matches based on research interests. Once your mentor/me
